scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a seated figure, likely Christ, holding a globe and gesturing with his right hand. Before him kneels a woman, presumably the Virgin Mary, with her hands outstretched. Behind her, another kneeling figure, possibly an angel, offers a bowl. In the background, a group of figures with conical hats are visible within a framed architectural element. The overall setting appears to be within an arched architectural frame, suggesting a devotional or religious context.
